channel.title: Auto-Post Batches on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Auto-Post Batches on 0x000216

item.title: Envisage Software's Post Master feature in Dynamics GP allows for automatic posting of batches.
item.description:
UPDATE: Envisage Software has introduced Post Master Enterprise. This new product functions as a Windows Service, enabling it to post Dynamics GP batches even when the GP client is not running or logged in. http://dynamicsgpland.blogspot.com/2012/07/new-windows-service-posts-dynamics-gp.html The author recently created an eConnect SOP integration to import a high volume of daily orders (up to 40,000) from an e-commerce platform into Dynamics GP. Initial tests using sample data showed eConnect could manage over 500 transactions per minute, exceeding the import speed required for 40,000 daily orders...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/envisage-software-s-post-master-feature-in-dynamics-gp-allows-for-automatic-posting-of-batches/
